name: 82ch
description: MCP Security Framework with Desktop UI

scripts.install-all: pip install -r requirements.txt && npm install && cd front && npm install
scripts.kill-server:win: FOR /F "tokens=5" %P IN ('netstat -ano ^| findstr :8282 ^| findstr LISTENING') DO taskkill /PID %P /F
scripts.kill-server: node -e "const {execSync}=require('child_process');try{execSync(process.platform==='win32'?'FOR /F \"tokens=5\" %P IN (\'netstat -ano ^| findstr :8282 ^| findstr LISTENING\') DO taskkill /PID %P /F':'lsof -ti:8282 | xargs kill -9',{stdio:'inherit',shell:true})}catch(e){}"
